articles.title: Dairy Data Science
articles.description: Some additional details about the blog
articles.contents:
About me
Welcome to the blog. My name is Padraig Lucey and I’m a current PhD student in Animal Biology.

            Bio
            Pádraig is a board certified Veterinarian in preventive
            medicine (ACVPM) and a graduate student in Animal Biology at
            the University of California, Davis.
            His research thesis is focused on mathematical modeling and
            dairy cow nutrition. This work emphasizes the distribution
            of dry matter intake across cow populations, and creating
            predictive models of feed requirements to increase the
            precision of cow group diet formulation.
            
            
            Education
            Bachelor of Veterinary Medicine DVM |
            University College Dublin | 2016
            Masters of Preventive Medicine MPVM |
            University of California, Davis | 2019
            Ph.D in Animal Biology | University of California, Davis
            | Candidate
            
            
            Experience
            Resident Veterinarian in Dairy Production Medicine |
            University of California, Davis | 2017 - 2020
            Livestock Veterinarian | Parklands Veterinary Group |
            2016 - 2017
            
            Consider following me on Medium
